casebody.data:
RETAINED REALTY, INC.
v.
Eileen M. LENAHAN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017 Jack E. Robinson, in support of the petition. Taryn D. Martin and Robert A. Ziegler, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40183) is denied.

ROBINSON, MULLINS and KAHN, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
